alert.note: Alert for Richmond (Staten Is.) (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 3:56PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeast New Jersey and Staten Island through 445 PM EDT... At 353 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered thunderstorms along a line extending from near Budd Lake to Chester to Hopewell. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newark, Paterson, Elizabeth, Passaic, Wayne, Plainfield, Bloomfield, Linden, Orange, Ridgewood, Summit, Millburn, Ramsey, Harrison, Pompton Lakes, Caldwell, Hawthorne, Clark, Bloomingdale and Fairfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
